metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to |Clerk| - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Clerk_000 - af575949-4460-46d8-ba7b-71c9d35738b7 - (-120 9 -236)

0.speaker: Cashier Stivvo
0.text: Sorry, saer, but these people won't see to themselves.

1.speaker: Cashier Stivvo
1.text: I saw nothing! Hells, I'd rob this place too!
1.context: NodeContext: Frantic, panicked friendliness - cowering as bank alarm goes off, just wants us gone

2.speaker: Cashier Stivvo
2.text: If it's a vault pass you need, speak to Head Clerk Meadhoney, please. Saer.
